title: Lovely One +Bedroom With Private Deck and 2 Car Parking!
posting_body: Parking:: off-street parking is included in the rent
Lovely One+ Bedroom on the second and third floors of a beautifully maintained two family home in a convenient Needham location, available July 15th!
This unit features mostly hardwood floors, lots of windows, great light, a recently renovated kitchen and a HUGE PRIVATE DECK!

Additional features include one bedroom on the second floor with a nicely updated full bath and an additional den/office space which occupies the third floor and features a neutral wall to wall carpeting.
Two off street parking spaces are included in the rent and tenants pay all utilities.
A cat is allowed and for further information and showings call Heidi at 617-699-4568!
